Text.val: Created: 11.01.2010 (SCR15218) (Based on previous version of program)
16.04.2013 SH SCR18097 Addede call of BAD002/5 ReplaceChar for Unicode fields (which probably contain reserved characters)
... uses as delimiter between text strings
... uses as separator between fields (= normal comma)
-- Multiple variables have to be separated by '|' (Hex 7C, Chr(124))
-- Text fields have to be written within inv. commas ("Text")
